name: Sal's Personal
description: A delightful combination of crispy breaded chicken cutlets, Italian bread, fresh mozzarella, garden-fresh tomatoes, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze.

name: The Hungry Man
description: Piled high with succulent roast beef, tender turkey, savory ham, crispy bacon, a variety of mouthwatering cheeses, and fresh, crisp veggies.

name: The Mobster's Deluxe
description: Soft Italian bread stuffed with tender meatballs, homemade marinara sauce, melted cheese, and your choice of fresh veggies.

name: The Godfather
description: Layers of freshly baked Italian bread, premium Genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, tender ham, provolone cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, red onions, banana peppers, and zesty Italian dressing.
